message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for you. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction while maximizing its value for me. I believe this price aligns closely with the product's worth to you and offers an attractive deal. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.
